tool_description: Fetches current statutory rates, PRO rates, and mechanical rates for specific territories and royalty types.

territory.description: Territory code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) to fetch rates for

royalty_type.description: Type of royalty rate needed (mechanical, performance, sync_minimum)

rate_date.description: Date for which rates are needed (rates change over time)

error_messages: Invalid territory code: Territory must be valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
Unknown royalty type: royalty_type must be one of 'mechanical', 'performance', or 'sync_minimum'.
Invalid rate date: Date must be in valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Rate not available: No rate data available for the specified territory, type, and date combination.
usage: Provide territory code, royalty_type, and rate_date to retrieve applicable statutory or standard rates for royalty calculations.

applicable_rate.description: The rate applicable for the specified parameters

rate_effective_date.description: Date when this rate became effective

rate_source.description: Authority or organization that set this rate
